verses.verse: <S%H8199>Judge<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord; for I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8537>integrity<s%>: I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> also in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; therefore I shall not <S%H4571>slide<s%>.
<S%H974>Examine<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, and <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H6884>me<s%>; try my <S%H3629>minds<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
For your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is before my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: and I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in your <S%H571>truth<s%>.
I have not <S%H3427>sat<s%> with <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4962>persons<s%>, neither will I go <S%H935>in<s%> with <S%H5956>dissemblers<s%>.
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of evil <S%H7489>doers<s%>; and will not <S%H3427>sit<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
I will <S%H7364>wash<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence<s%>: so will I <S%H5437>compass<s%> your <S%H4196>altar<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:
That I may <S%H8085>publish<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, and <S%H5608>tell<s%> of all your wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
<S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I have <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H4583>habitation<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H4725>place<s%> where your <S%H3519>honor<s%> <S%H4908>dwells<s%>.
<S%H622>Gather<s%> not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2400>sinners<s%>, nor my <S%H2416>life<s%> with <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>:
In whose <S%H3027>hands<s%> is <S%H2154>mischief<s%>, and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes<s%>.
But as for <S%H3212>me<s%>, I will walk in my <S%H8537>integrity<s%>: <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H2603>me<s%>, and be merciful unto me.
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> in a even <S%H4334>place<s%>: in the <S%H4721>congregations<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
